transcript.speaker: Abhi
transcript.content: Hi, this is Abhi from RiverLine Bank. Am I speaking with Vasu?

transcript.speaker: Abhi
transcript.content: Hello, this is Abhi, a collections agent from RiverLine Bank. Can I

transcript.speaker: Vasu
transcript.content: Stop calling me. This is harassment. Stop calling me.

transcript.speaker: Abhi
transcript.content: I understand your frustration, Vasu. I'm just trying to discuss

transcript.speaker: Vasu
transcript.content: No. No. Listen listen to me. Listen to me. Listen to me. I have already filed

transcript.speaker: Vasu
transcript.content: for chapter seven bankruptcy. My lawyer told me you cannot call me anymore.

transcript.speaker: Abhi
transcript.content: I see. I apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. However,

transcript.speaker: Vasu
transcript.content: Talk to my lawyer. Talk to my lawyer. Goodbye.

risk_analysis.agent_notes: Debtor has filed for Chapter 7 bankruptcy and is refusing to pay, requesting to speak with their lawyer.
